backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing debate orchestration, agent registry with pre-populated agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), user profile management, file metadata storage, and access control with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence requirements for wrapping backend.start_boardroom_debate() in try/catch/finally with error logging and state reset in frontend/src/App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing React components, hooks, and utilities with emphasis on error handling, state management, and UI behavior fixes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette supporting light and dark modes for a technical backend infrastructure aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with tab navigation (boardroom, sensory, health), Internet Identity authentication, debate orchestration with handleTranscriptComplete callback wrapped in try/catch/finally for error handling and state reset.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table component displaying agent status with kill switch toggles, comprehensive error handling in toggle operations with finally block ensuring updatingId state reset, and tactical dark aesthetic.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays a debate transcript with color-coded messages from different speakers (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM, User), showing emergency mode badge when active and providing text-to-speech playback for Robby's messages when authenticated.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an ongoing debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend's abort debate mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button for speech recognition that starts/stops listening and calls onTranscriptComplete callback when speech recognition stops with a new transcript, using a ref to prevent duplicate processing.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file upload functionality with drag-and-drop, camera capture, and manual selection, processing files in 1.8MB chunks and routing documents to appropriate agents based on file type and content preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing auth client creation, identity persistence, and authentication status throughout the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations including debate status polling, starting boardroom debates, aborting debates, routing documents, and managing agent statuses with automatic query invalidation on mutations.
Wraps the Web Speech Recognition API in a React hook with start/stop controls, using functional state updates to prevent stale closure issues and providing transcript, error state, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the Web Speech API for text-to-speech, providing speak/cancel functions with British male voice preference and state tracking for isSpeaking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub file with TODO to integrate Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection for triggering speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH variables, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a known issue with frozen UI when backend.start_boardroom_debate() fails, with three existing features implementing try/catch/finally error handling in handleTranscriptComplete.
